website_summaries.verdict: Standing out in particular for its stylishness and traction, this is a great option if you often forego the cart and do a lot of walking on the course.
pros: The shoe fits well and offers a lot of comfort and support
Walking golfers in particular love it
cons: Sizing runs a little large, so you may want to order down
Some reports of durability issues within a year of purchase

customer_reviews.title: Best damn golf shoe you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Ain’t no golf shoe like an ECCO golf shoe. This is my 5th pair. I strayed earlier in the season and bought a pair of Adidas (360 Boost). Comfort-wise, not even close. For me, the tow box was too wide and I found my feet sliding around—even though the size was right. Going back to ECCO made me realize why I fell in love with them in the first place. If you walk the course, ECCO is your shoe. Tip: always use ECCO’s size suggestions. I’m a 9.5 and wear a 42 in ECCO. That translates to an 8 / 8.5 for their sizing. Whatever. That’s the only weird thing about the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bradlywilliam Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly.  Extra comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Extra comfortable. I've walked 36 holes on a hilly course and no blisters. I will say that the heal is higher than normal and I ended up having to wear quarter socks rather than ankle high. No biggie - I didn't get a blister when I wore the ankle high socks but switched just to have a cushion there just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle

customer_reviews.title: I was very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with this purchase. I'm size 10.5 and these golf shoes fit perfectly out of the box. I was disappointed with another expensive FJ pair of shoes I bought and returned them. These shoes, however, fit like a soft glove, and remained a comfortable temperature through out my first two rounds of golf in them (unlike the FJs). I'm a convert to quality shoes from here on.
customer_reviews.author: H. Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. Bought them brand new for my golf trip of 27 holes a day for 6 days. Wore them for the first time on the first day of the trip. I was able to wear them everyday for all 27 holes plus the time spent in them after the rounds were over, and never had a problem with my feet. Felt like I had worn them for years. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Faruzzi

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes brand.
customer_reviews.text: If you can’t decide on size, go smaller then your usual size. I have several pairs of ecco shoes and they all run big. I usually wear 9 & 9.5. Ordered 8, 8.5 and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yong Cho

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality at a High Cost
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was great for a little over a year. Then the upper completely separated from the sole. Warranty only lasts one year. How convenient... This is not what I would expect for a quality (and expensive) golf shoe. I have multiple pairs of golf shoes 5-6 years old and still functioning like new. This will be my last Ecco shoe purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe. It has the strong heel cup I require and is comfortable. The shoe provides the stable platform needed for a confident golf swing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom4628

customer_reviews.title: spike sockets break
customer_reviews.text: Love ECCO. I have many of their street and golf shoes. In fact they're all I buy. They fit great. I gave these two stars as the spike sockets break in less than a year (approximately 75 rounds). I have lost over half my spikes is less than a year and have to trash them. But I'm buying another pair as they fit so well
customer_reviews.author: Flyingdiver

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, need better spike system.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot with a high instep and have a problem finding shoes that fit. These shoes fit great. Only issue I've had is with a previous boom model. When changing the spikes they don't come out easily. When you do get them out the new spikes don't stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Landis

customer_reviews.title: I am happy that he is happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these golf shoes. He walks the course and carries his bag. He walks 18 holes on the weekend and 9 holes after work on weekdays. No back ache nor sore feet. I am happy that he is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shuguh

customer_reviews.title: ... with in a year since the shoes is very comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This is 3rd one I bought with in a year since the shoes is very comfortable but not durable. I bought 1st one last Sept, only 8 months, it was worn out . Then I bought 2nd one, within a month, already 5 spikes fell out, I return it and bought 3rd one, 2 spikes fell out after I just practiced 10 minutes in driving range. Unbelievable such quality with more than $240 plus tax. So bad.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Although slightly used, they took half of a round to break in. They are an excellent shoe, and kept my feet dry on a soggy day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great! Wearing them in the morning, can’t wait.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good value proposition. But only had the shoes two weeks. Check back in a year and get an update on how well the shoe does over time.
customer_reviews.author: chfjr

customer_reviews.title: I have Plantar Fasciitis and these shoes provide me GREAT comfort as well as a nice style
customer_reviews.text: I have Plantar Fasciitis and these shoes provide me GREAT comfort as well as a nice style. I would definitely recommend these shoes for anyone. Arrived as expected. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SNAFU

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe with Style !!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf shoe .. if your in between sizes I would size up .. Really comfortable, Awesome quality on the leather and IMHO very stylish. Great Job Ecco and thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: USC Trojan 37

customer_reviews.title: yet very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes always seem to me to be of extraordinarily high quality, and these are no exception. They are durable, tough, yet very comfortable right out of the box. Love Ecco's.
customer_reviews.author: Rutlander

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoes I have ever put on
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I have ever put on. Didn't even have to break them in. By hole number 2 I had already made the decision that I need another pair so I can have another color. Best shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Played with then one time I thought they would be a little tight but they were not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy, yet light weight golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the Biom G2 golf shoe. This is a very sturdy, yet light weight golf shoe. By far the best of the many golf shoes I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: MRyan

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable shoes in Golf
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit like a glove from the very start and is wearing fine. This is my second pair of Ecco Bioms and I love them for the fit and feel. The black version does not look as pleasing as the grey or ivory.
customer_reviews.author: Kaimuki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ecco is an outstanding brand that is worth the expense
customer_reviews.author: Peter R. Duke

customer_reviews.title: It is not durable
customer_reviews.text: It feels comfortable but not durable, after wearing about 7 months (Sept. 16-May. 17) probably once a week, it is broken. I have to buy another one. And also it is much more expensive compare to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: Own several pair of ecco dress shoes. One pair that I wore in retail sales for 7-8 years. So, in shopping for golf shoes, decided on ecco, always bought footjoy before. Glad that I did. Feel and look great. always knew a size 9 in footjoy would always fit. However with age goes some new traditions
customer_reviews.author: Mario Carovillano

customer_reviews.title: perfect golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: all is well with this shoe....in fact replacing this as the previous one (same shoe that i had) was used up so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Bharath Jaganathan

customer_reviews.title: The Best Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these, first one lasted two years. I play golf three times a week and these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Clark

customer_reviews.title: Consider larger size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe overall, and very lightweight. However, I developed a heel blister the first couple of times wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Drew

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are like walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like walking on air. I have plantar fasciitis and can walk all day in them. I walked 18 holes on Friday, Saturday and Sunday no problem. I have also gotten a number of compliments on how great they look. I call that a bonus
customer_reviews.author: ken cuebas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get them 5 days later but it fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mauril Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: either with spikes or spike less are as comfortable golf shoe as you would want
customer_reviews.text: Ecco golf shoes, either with spikes or spike less are as comfortable golf shoe as you would want. From the first wearing until at least five years later (first ones I bought) They are certainly not the cheapest, but well worth the additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Butter
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Ecco shoes for a long time and they are some of the best for comfort. These provide just enough amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: moosehead

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, just too narrow for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Transactions were a breeze. Great shoes, just too narrow for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: No heel cushion, poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great, but they do not have any cushion in heel, poor fit and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Comfortable toe box that lets your toes feel like they are gripping the ground. Most comfortable golf shoe I've found. We'll made and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: As for playability they are awesome. Love the ultra light weight
customer_reviews.text: Thes shoes are a touch small but give a little after a couple of rounds. As for playability they are awesome. Love the ultra light weight. Spikeless with plenty of grip. I'm a fan of True Linkswear because of the comfort and these are right there.
customer_reviews.author: michael p.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Ecco Shoes will more than compensate you for your bad scores!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shoes! It arrived on time. Unfortunately , It is a bit tight but hopefully will loosen up over time in the links. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Sy

customer_reviews.title: 5 is more like 10-10. 5
customer_reviews.text: Price 5 stars, Product 5 stars, Delivery 5 Stars, Size 9-9.5 is more like 10-10.5. I returned and reorder smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In a class by themselves
customer_reviews.text: While I add orthodics in every shoe I own, including these, there is no better golf shoe made. BioM's - especially these G2's - may even be the most comfortable in my closet, bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for golf. Great support and feel, and they look great, too!
customer_reviews.author: musicstarrman

customer_reviews.title: Best performance golf shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best performance golf shoes on the market. If you've got a bit of a narrow foot, go with half a size down. I normally wear a size 11 with width between C and D. 10-1/2 is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Glennbob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ecco golf shoes are the best fitting and feeling golf shoes sold.
customer_reviews.author: mark davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its all about fit, fit my feet perfectly but everybody's feet are different.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always a good choice to wear Ecco shoes...for on and off the golf course.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, no break in period. Well constructed, very supple leather
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Katafias

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, fit, & feel. Best gf shoes I've ever worn. I walk when I play & the Ecco comfort & support is fantastic!!

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. Pain free first round. Couldn't ask for more in a quality golf shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them already
customer_reviews.text: As always, stellar quality and fit from Ecco. I have more than 10 pairs and these are clearly the best brand out of the box. The insert in these provides just enough arch support as well...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love ECCO shoes, have 3 pairs now. Most comfortable shoes..
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Just a great looking golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Awesome look and feel. This is my third pair of Ecco shoes and I will most likely buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are by far the best golf shoes I have ever had and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Biom's and my first G2. They are by far the best golf shoes I have ever had and I have tried many, many different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I've ever worn. I have this shoe in three colors. Absolutely love them.

customer_reviews.title: but very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a cushy as I had hoped, but very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: charles tabor

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort
customer_reviews.text: I currently own four pairs of ECCO golf shoes. No other shoe is as comfortable and I have tried most of the major brands in my 50+ golfing years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe!!! Own several pairs. Tried a few other brands and always come back to the Ecco Biom.

customer_reviews.title: Leather ripping after only 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really comfortable but aren’t very sturdy. 3 months old and have 6-7 rounds played in them and the eyelets are ripping apart.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's early but so far good. Very comfortable, easy to clean and fits great. Love ECCO.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. Fit perfectly. If you know Ecco you know these shoes are awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Ecco Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit of these shoes is amazing. No break-in period was necessary unlike my last golf shoes, (Foot Joys which are also great). I have not tried walking the course yet as the weather is too hot during the summer months in Texas. The color is a little different than I was expecting, it's kind of a bone grey color as opposed to light tan color. But my wife says the color looks good with just about anything. So I am happy if she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Reyetwon

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am a Ecco believer. Have several pairs. Play 3-4 times a week and walk most of the time. Great fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I've ever had on my foot. In the past I have had Nike, Foot Joy and Under armor, and none compare to these. Buy them, you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than FootJoy
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 12.5 or 13 depending upon the shoe. The toe fits fine and although the width initially feels a little tight, I think they will loosen up after a couple more rounds. The spikes are really good! I would recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Gesiskie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and excellent traction.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe out of the box I have ever worn. Excellent traction and very nice looking golf shoe. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes I've worn
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I've worn, this is my second pair. Will get another pair in different color soon. I walk between 30-50 miles a week, never do I complain about the walk...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe at a great price. Arrives ahead of schedule!
customer_reviews.author: Don Smart

customer_reviews.title: started out great but by the 15th hole my feet were extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most uncomfortable golf shoes I've ever worn. My first round in them, started out great but by the 15th hole my feet were extremely sore around the ball of my foot, couldn't wait for the round to end. Extremely disappointed, was so looking forward to my Ecco shoes as I had heard how remarkable Ecco shoes were in their comfort factor. Maybe it's just this model, but I would not recommend them and can't wait to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ecco shoes for six years and these shoes are finest I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best price I have ever seen for this show. Shoes are exceptional
customer_reviews.author: Michael McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: You will never buy another brand after wearing Ecco's
customer_reviews.text: Simply the finest golf shoes I have ever worn. Golfing since 1970.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Skorupa

customer_reviews.title: ... 3rd pair of Ecco's the heal depth isn't as good with this pair but it is OK -- why ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Ecco's the heal depth isn't as good with this pair but it is OK -- why do they factory lace them in such a funky way? The first thing you have to do is pull the laces and re-lace them in a normal manner so you can tighten them properly. If you don't you will just be frustrated trying to tighten the laces...
customer_reviews.author: aj4value

customer_reviews.title: These golf shoes are some of the most comfortable I have ever ordered
customer_reviews.text: The fit of these golf shoes are right on the money.I play a lot of golf and walk most of the time. These golf shoes are some of the most comfortable I have ever ordered.They fit well, right to of the box! The biggest unknown at this point in time is how well they last.To be determined?
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like most ECCO shoes, incredibly comfortable. 3rd pair I have bought - love them all.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes;comfortable, great arch support, fantastic for walking 18 holes!
customer_reviews.author: Cary Liu

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes... I normally wear an 11 shoe and a 11 wide in boots. Bought the 10-10.5 and they fit perfect, really comfortable. Would buy again...
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive. Wore well even on the first 18.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn! Pricey, but if they last, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Herring

customer_reviews.title: Bioms ROCK.  Great golf shoes.  You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. They fit my wide feet perfectly and have plenty of arch support. Yak leather is so supple it molds to the foot. Light weight, great traction from soft spikes. This is my second pair of Ecco Bioms. The first pair is two years old and I bought these to interchange with those, which are still in great shape even though I play in all weather conditions, tournaments, several times a week. They are not cheap, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to the Max
customer_reviews.text: I've played two rounds of golf in these shoes and my feet do not hurt at all after the round. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Don Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ecco comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic comfortable shoe straight out of the box. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: haven't got to play a round yet but when tried on in the house have never felt anything better on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Wow.haven't got to play a round yet but when tried on in the house have never felt anything better on my feet...... update have played three rounds starting to fade on color.......update spikes wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable I wore them for 27 walking holes the first ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable I wore them for 27 walking holes the first time I put them on (in hilly KY.) Heel blister clearly self inflicted, but very comfortable and surprisingly supportive for a light weight shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light the Hills is perfect for walking
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light the Hills is perfect for walking

customer_reviews.text: my husband said they were the most comfortable golf shoes he ever had and since he has been playing golf for 27 years, that's say a lot!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in all aspects from ordering to drivery as well as satisfaction with the product received.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for wide feet. Very comfortable all day on the course.

customer_reviews.title: Those are looks good and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: ECCO make high quielity golf sheos. Biom G2 is my secend ECCO golf shoes. Those are looks good and very comfortable. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and comfortable. Good experience and look forward to wearing on course this Spring.

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Biom G2 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
Whether your handicap's in single or double figures, these high performance men's golf shoes will make you feel like a pro. Soft leather uppers are complemented by extra-light construction, while the biom anatomically shaped last is based on a scan of 2,500 feet for optimum stability with every step. A golf shoe that performs at the highest level, yet doesn't compromise on style.

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: Leather upper with padded tongue and collar
Placed spikes for grip and traction
